member.name: ID3D12DeviceChild.GetDevice
member.summary: Gets a pointer to the device that created this interface.
member.param: The globally unique identifier (GUID) for the device interface. The REFIID, or GUID, of the interface to the device can be obtained by using the __uuidof() macro. For example, __uuidof() will get the GUID of the interface to a device.
A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to the interface for the device.
member.returns: This method returns one of the Direct3D 12 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D12DeviceChild
member.summary: An interface from which other core interfaces inherit from, including (but not limited to) , , , and . It provides a method to get back to the device object it was created against.
